name: titillation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of intentionally making someone slightly excited, usually with sexual images or descriptions: We've certainly seen an increase on TV of foul language and sexual titillation. There's more going on in this film than cheap titillation. See
titillate
More examplesFewer examplesThe internet has an endless appetite for titillation and controversy.Her films may be explicit, but they are about more than mere titillation.There has been a lot written about her, but I think a lot of it is just pure titillation.
